name: Moon Observatory Iris
descr:
Iris works as a Purifier, a person who helps souls of the deceased move on to the afterlife. Her fate changes after coming into contact with the Magicians, half-immortal beings who watch over the MO worlds. Interacting with them, the mystery of the MO worlds' origins will come to light.

Don't be deceived by the lighthearted parts--despite the fun fantasy setting, MO isn't a world that will let you survive with something as flimsy as "the power of friendship."

This is a story written to make you both laugh and cry. At the very least, it has a lot of puns and glasses jokes. This game has a 75% "made me cry" rate, according to the survey.

[b]✦ Characters ✦[/b]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1598220/extras/Untitled650.png?t=1652110131[/img]

Iris: The heroine. A gentle, awkward, and surprisingly brave girl who tries her best.

Rieffe: Iris' kind but detached childhood friend who always worries about her.

Lanneis: A strict and sarcastic person who glares and pushes up his glasses way too often.

Reqieu: Used to be Iris' teacher. Serious, but gentle and low-key sarcastic.

Septem: A serious, kind, and dutiful boy who likes flowers. He's kind of shy once you talk to him. Always polite.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1598220/extras/BsCOTE_770_width_2.png?t=1652110131[/img]

[b]✦ Warnings: light/moderate blood, themes of death[/b]
✦ Standalone game but with references to the other Magical Otoge games (Ciel, Anholly)
✦ Stretch goal bonus routes added for free after purchase milestones (details in the Google Form after purchasing the game)

This game is a [b]straightforward visual novel, so there's no walkthrough necessary.[/b] It will be very obvious when a choice will affect the ending. After clearing the game once, a guide will appear in the Extras that explains how to get the Good/Bad Ends.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1598220/extras/wiMNwg_500_width.png?t=1652110131[/img]
detail:
名称: Moon Observatory Iris

review: 全部评测: 好评 (17) - 此游戏的 17 篇用户评测中有 94% 为好评。
全部评测: 好评 (17 篇中的 94%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7 or later
内存: 1 GB RAM
显卡: Graphics card with DirectX 9 level (shader model 2.0) capabilities.
存储空间: 需要 390 MB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: OS X 10.6
内存: 1 GB RAM
显卡: Graphics card with DirectX 9 level (shader model 2.0) capabilities.
存储空间: 需要 390 MB 可用空间
*
2024 年 2 月 15 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将不再支持 32 位游戏及 macOS 10.14 或更低版本。

SteamOS + Linux
最低配置:
操作系统: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
显卡: Graphics card with DirectX 9 level (shader model 2.0) capabilities.
存储空间: 需要 390 MB 可用空间
